Uses of Class
datext.DaTextElement

  • Packages that use DaTextElement 
    Package Description
    datext  

    • Uses of DaTextElement in datext

      Methods in datext that return DaTextElement 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract DaTextElement DaTextElement.clone()
      Implementations must override the clonde() method to perform a deep copy, treating the copy at the root of a new tree.
      abstract DaTextElement DaTextElement.getElement(java.lang.String key)
      Gets the child element by the given variable name, if it exists.
      abstract DaTextElement DaTextElement.getOrSetElement(java.lang.String key)
      Gets the child element by the given element name, if it exists, or adds a new element if it doesn't already exist.
      DaTextElement DaTextElement.getParent()
      Gets the element that owns this element.
      DaTextElement DaTextElement.getRoot()
      Gets the root (aka Document) element that this element belongs to.
      Methods in datext that return types with arguments of type DaTextElement 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract java.util.List<DaTextElement> DaTextElement.getChildElements()
      Enumerates all child elements of this element.
      Methods in datext with parameters of type DaTextElement 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void DaTextElement.putCopyOf(java.lang.String key, DaTextElement other)
      Clones the other element and adds it to this element.
      protected void DaTextElement.setParent(DaTextElement newParent)
      Sets the owning element.
      protected void DaTextElement.setRoot(DaTextElement newRoot)
      Sets the root element.
